returns._0: bool if the user is the specified list.

addDelegate(address).notice: Only root can add delegates. Delegates have mutate permissions.

addUserAddress(address,bytes32).notice: Adds a user to the mapping of Eth address to FractalId.

addUserToList(bytes32,string).notice: Add user by FractalId to a specific list.

isUserInList(bytes32,string).notice: Checks if a user by FractalId exists in a specific list.

removeDelegate(address).notice: Removing delegates is only posible from root or by himself.

removeUserAddress(address).notice: Removes an address from the mapping of Eth address to FractalId.

removeUserFromList(bytes32,string).notice: Remove user by FractalId from a specific list.
